text.text: How can I change the facility for a previously invoiced claim?

text: To change the facility for a previously invoiced claim, you can go to the claim page and click the "Remove from facility invoice" button. You can also change the primary facility on the coordination of benefits tab.

text.text: What should I do if I billed the wrong facility on a claim?

text: If you billed the wrong facility on a claim, you can fix the incorrect charge and then send the facility a new statement. You can also change the claim's primary payer and re-bill.

text.text: Where can I find the claim I need to modify after invoicing?

text: You can find the claim you need to modify after invoicing by entering the claim number or patient's last name in the search field. On the results window, click the claim number to view the claim. The claim's status will be Submitted - Patient statement.

text.text: How do I access the Coordination of Benefits tab on the Claim page?

text: The Coordination of Benefits tab is located on the Claim Creation pages and on the Claim page. You can access it by clicking the Coordination of Benefits tab (this tab opens by default).

text.text: Can I edit the primary facility after the claim has been invoiced?

text: Yes, you can edit the primary facility after the claim has been invoiced. To do this, you need to find the claim by entering the claim number or patient's last name in Search. Click the claim number to land on the Claim page. Click the Coordination of benefits tab. Click the edit pencil. Change the primary facility to the correct facility. You can also change the claim's primary payer and re-bill.

text.text: What steps should I take to change the primary facility on the claim?

text: To change the primary facility on the claim, you need to find the claim by entering the claim number or patient's last name in Search. Click the claim number to land on the Claim page. Click the Coordination of benefits tab. Click the edit pencil. Change the primary facility to the correct facility.

text.text: How do I indicate the correct facility to bill on the Coordination of Benefits tab?

text: To indicate the correct facility to bill on the Coordination of Benefits tab, you need to click the Facility tile. In the Primary: Facility box, you will see three buttons - Origin, Destination, and Other. If your pick-up or drop-off was to a facility, you can pick either to bill. If you don't want to bill either, but want to bill a 3rd party facility, click Other.

text.text: What happens after I save the changes to the primary facility?

text: After you save the changes to the primary facility, a check mark will indicate that the first facility was billed. Billing is now targeted at the facility you indicated as the new primary facility.

text.text: How can I ensure that billing is targeted at the new primary facility?

text: You can ensure that billing is targeted at the new primary facility by clicking the Queued claims tab. You will see the claim in the list for this facility. You can then preview the invoice and generate it.

text.text: What does it mean to queue a claim for submission?

text: When you queue a claim for submission, it is scheduled to go to the clearinghouse via the nightly batch submission. The claim's status changes to "Queued for submission - Facility invoice".

text.text: Where can I find the newly queued claim after changing the primary facility?

text: You can find the newly queued claim by clicking the Queued claims tab. You will see the claim in the list for this facility. You can then preview the invoice and generate it.

text.text: How do I navigate to the Facilities page?

text: To get to the Facilities page, click Facilities on the navigation bar.

text.text: What should I do after clicking on the new primary facility name on the Facilities page?

text: To view facility details, click the facility name. You can see open submitted and queued claims, as well as past invoices and running balance.

text.text: Where can I locate the Queued claims tab on the Facilities page?

text: You can find the Queued claims tab on the Facilities page by clicking the With outstanding balance tab. You can then see a list of claims that have yet to be invoiced.

text.text: Why is it important to preview the invoice before generating it?

text: Previewing a facility invoice is a good way to ensure its accuracy and obtain an understanding of the final invoice's appearance.

text.text: What options do I have after previewing the invoice?

text: Once you have reviewed the preview invoice, you can make corrections if necessary. When you are satisfied with the accuracy, click the "Generate invoice" button to create the final version.

text.text: Is there a way to confirm that the correct facility is now targeted for billing?

text: A check mark will indicate that the first facility was billed. Billing is now targeted at the facility you indicated as the new primary facility.

text.text: How do I ensure that the changes to the facility have been successfully applied?

text: A pop-up window will inform you that updates made for this facility at the parent level will also update the facility record for all linked child companies.

text.text: Can I make changes to the claim's details before generating the invoice?

text: Yes, you can make changes to the claim's details before generating the invoice. To do this, click on the claim and make the necessary changes. Once you have made the changes, click on the "Save" button. The claim will be updated and the changes will be reflected in the invoice.

text.text: What should I do if I encounter any issues while changing facilities after invoicing?

text: If you have any issues while changing facilities after invoicing, you can contact.

text.text: How to change facilities after invoicing?explain the complete process

text: To change facilities after invoicing, you can follow these steps: 1. Find the claim by entering the claim number or patient's last name in Search 2. Click the claim number to land on the Claim page 3. Click the Coordination of benefits tab 4. Click the edit pencil 5. Change the primary facility to the correct facility 6. Click Save 7. A check mark will indicate that the first facility was billed 8. Billing is now targeted at the facility you indicated as the new primary facility.
